content.rendered:
Directed by Euros Lyn.

Written by Alice Oseman. Alice Oseman. Alice Oseman.

Cast Kit Connor( Nick Nelson ) . Yasmin/ep Finney( Elle Argent ) . William Gao( Tao Xu ) . Cormac Hyde-Corrin( Harry Greene ) . Tobie Donovan( Isaac Henderson ) . Rhea Norwood( Imogen Heaney ) . Sebastian Croft( Ben Hope ) . Olivia Colman( Sarah Nelson ) . Emily Ng( Madame Martin ) . Ashwin Vishwanath( Sai Verma ) . Evan Ovenell( Christian McBride ) . Araloyin Oshunremi( Otis Smith ) . Corinna Brown( Tara Jones ) . Jenny Walser( Tori Spring ) . Kizzy Edgell( Darcy Olsson ) . Echo( Nellie (Nick’s Dog) ) . Fisayo Akinade( Mr. Ajayi ) . Chetna Pandya( Coach Singh ) . Alan Turkington( Mr. Lange ) . Joseph Balderrama( Julio Spring ) . Georgina Rich( Jane Spring ) . Isabel Adomakoh-Young( Miss Greenwood ) . Momo Yeung( Yan Xu ) . Stephen Fry( Headmaster Barnes ) . Bradley Riches( James McEwan ) . Courtney-Jai( Self ) . Richard Stemp( Mr. Budd ) . Leonie Spilsbury( Miss Hyder ) . Fin Milne( Student 2 ) . Frewyn Thursfield( Orchestra Girl ) . Ella Maisy Purvis( Girl 1 ) . Jack O’Doherty( Young Nick ) . Jessal Kullar-Bell( Girl 2 ) . Livia Nelson( Young Tara ) . Kush Mukerji( Student 1 ) . Hesper Holden( Tiny Girl 1 ) . Tabitha Byron( Tiny Girl 2 ) . Emilie Largier( Madame Martin ) . Andrew Malik( Noah ) . Simon Strutt( Headteacher ) . Rebecca Root( Principal Edwards ) . Thibault de Montalembert( Stephane ) . Jack Barton( David ) . Eden Gough( Young Tao ) . Nima Taleghani( Mr. Farouk ) . Leila Khan( Sahar Zahid ) .James McEwan . Nicholas McCluskey( Student (uncredited) ) . Lee Westwick( Student (uncredited) ) . Alice Oseman( Girl on Train (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Patrick Walters. Alice Oseman. Iain Canning. Nicky Earnshaw. Simon Gillis. Hakan Kousetta. Jamie Laurenson. Euros Lyn. Zorana Piggott. Emily Precious. Dylan Rees. Emile Sherman. Xavier Roy. Emma Biggins.

Production See-Saw Films.

Number of Seasons 3

Number of Episodes 24

Status OnGoing (2022–)
